channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KY

item.title: Report E-2024110164
item.description:
Report E-2024110164

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-10T12:20:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-21
  • City: LEXINGTON
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately one (1) cup of Ultra System P30B 2k Primer Surfacer was released from four (4) one (1) gallon metal pails. The release impacted trailer floor; personnel advised they cleaned release using Oil Dri absorbent. Dayton Freight confirmed they cleaned all impacted areas and generated one (1) five (5) gallon poly drum of waste containing spent absorbents. Personnel also generated one (1) twenty (20) gallon poly drum of waste containing the four (4) one (1) gallon metal pails that released. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freightâ€™s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.
